plot: In the season premiere, Khloe and Lamar's marriage is stronger than ever, while Rob and Lamar's relationship takes a complete nosedive. Busier than ever with his "Dancing With the Stars" gig and other projects Rob decides it's time to move out and get his own place. But now that Rob is out of sight, he's out of mind to Lamar--and their once close and brotherly relationship becomes strained when neither one wants to "man up" and meet in the middle. Can Khloe get her baby brother and the love of her life back on good terms?
